Jesus' Example as a Youth.--The life of Jesus was filled with industry, and He took exercise in performing varied tasks in harmony with His developing physical 
                                                                           507
strength. In doing the work that was marked out for Him, He had no time for indulgence in exciting, useless amusements. He took no part in that which would poison the moral and lower the physical tone, but was trained in useful labor and even for the endurance of hardship.
